channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Cheap Irish Homes
channel.desc: Maggie and Kieran meet couple Vik and Tom in Galway, as they hunt for a house in the county.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
channel.desc: Drew and Jonathan tackle the kitchen, living room, and dining room to transform this empty-nester's home. The house has great bones but to function better for Lisa and Jay.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Real Health
channel.desc: We'll be discussing the ins and outs of postpartum depression, we dive into the challenges of chronic exposure to blue light, and we take a closer look at what leads to destructive and negative behaviours.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: AfriMaxx
channel.desc: Afrimaxx is a lifestyle show which searches for inspiration and innovation in all areas of popular culture - from fashion and design through to architecture, art, food and travel.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Living By Design
channel.desc: Jake and Jazz transform a bedroom to a guest retreat. Jazz adds calming, colours & textures. The reveal meal is Fried Rice with Tempura seafood, and Ginger Shortbread Cookies.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
channel.desc: House hunters are taken to see properties for sale in a foreign country that they want to move to or frequently holiday in.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Art Of Architecture
channel.desc: Norwegian architect, Kjetil Thorsen is the co-founder of Snohetta and architectural practice named after a mountain upon which the Wild Reindeer Pavilion, was built.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Jamie's Quick & Easy Food
channel.desc: Jamie's Quick & Easy Food is the ultimate set of go-to recipes that are quick to cook and easy to remember.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Nadiya Bakes
channel.desc: Nadiya takes us through a chicken and peppercorn pithivier, a cheeky pepperoni pull-apart bread, a chicken teriyaki noodle one-pan wonder and finally foolproof shortcrust pastry.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Restoration Australia
channel.desc: Anthony Burke meets Martin Nix who's restoring an 1850s workers cottage on Sydney Harbour while dealing with a recent family tragedy.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Scott's Vacation House Rules
channel.desc: In every episode Scott McGillivray helps make homeowner's dreams come true by unlocking the hidden potential in their dated, uninspired vacation property.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Trading Up With Mandy
channel.desc: Trading Up with Mandy Rennehan follows Blue Collar CEO and multimillion-dollar designer and construction mogul, Mandy Rennehan as she overhauls three unique properties in her beloved hometown of Yarmouth, Nova Scotia.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Donal Skehan: Home Cook
channel.desc: Donal shares recipes to suit every kind of busy household, with new, easy-to-follow recipes, time-saving hacks and practical cooking tips, including the kitchen gadgets that Donal relies on at home.

channel.title: Nadiya Bakes
